world-gen.confirm.description:
World breaking options are currently enabled. This will IRREVERSIBLY damage your world. Please backup your world before proceeding! The authors of this mod are not responsible if you lose your world or progress in your world!

Are you sure you want to continue?

Do you want to continue?
